author: Frank Corder
title: MCPP launches seetheschoolspending.org
text: The Mississippi Center for Public Policy has launched a new website aimed at giving the public a look inside school spending across the state. The site is seetheschoolspending.org . According to the site: "The SeeTheSchoolSpending tools are designed to allow you to access the same publicly available statistics we use for our research to do your own research online. "You can select the data you want to see and create your own graphs and ranked listings. Summary reports are also available at the State, District, and School levels. "You can save the graphs or rankings tables you create and use them in your own reports. Or you can e-mail them to someone who might be interested in the results you found." 10/22/15 Posted October 22, 2015 - 6:44 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments.
